space* join round and cut black leaving a tail to weave in 64sc *try crocheting in the back loops only of your yellow stitches for a crisper look finishing steps weave in all ends i prefer to anchor my ends with a knot before weaving in as this prevents the fabric from being pulled out of shape the tail of your magic_ring should also be pulled as tight as possible and secured with a knot weave in the tail in the opposite direction of your stitches working in a circle to keep it from unraveling a lot of gauge is placed on the center of a granny square so it pays to secure it well finally block
